66 
67  static void Apply(double (*func)(double), SeqViewDouble& ts) {
68  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
69  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
70  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
71 
72  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
73  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
74  (*data)(i, j) = func((*data)(i, j));
75  }
76  }
77  };
78 
79  static void Apply(double (*func)(double), SeqViewDouble& ts, SeqViewDouble& res) {
80  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
81  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
82  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
83  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
84  rs->resize(s1, s2);
85  res.SetStart(ts.GetStart());
86  res.SetSampling(ts.GetSampling());
87  res.SetScale(ts.GetScale());
88 
89  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
90  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
91  (*rs)(i, j) = func((*data)(i, j));
92  }
93  }
94  };
95 
96  static void BinOp(double (*func)(double, double), SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewDouble& ts2, SeqViewDouble& res) {
97  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
98  Dmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
99  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
100  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
101  unsigned int s2 = data2->size2();
102  if ((data2->size1() != s1) || (data2->size2() != s2)) {
103  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
104  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
105  }
106  rs->resize(s1, s2);
107  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
108  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
109  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
110 
111  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
112  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
113  (*rs)(i, j) = func((*data1)(i, j), (*data2)(i, j));
114  }
115  }
116  };
117 
118  static void Norm(double (*func)(double), SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewDouble& res) {
119  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
120  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
121  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
122  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
123  if (rs->size1() != 1 || (rs->size2() != s2)) {
124  LogWarning("Util::Norm : Resizing output view");
125  rs->resize(1, s2);
126  }
127  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
128  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
129  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
130 
131  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
132  (*rs)(0, j) = 0;
133  }
134 
135  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
136  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
137  (*rs)(0, j) += func((*data1)(i, j));
138  }
139  (*rs)(0, j) = sqrt((*rs)(0, j));
140  }
141  };
142 
143  void Apply(std::complex<double> (*func)(std::complex<double>), SeqViewComplex& fs) {
144  Cmatrix* data = fs.GetData();
145  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
146  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
147 
148  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
149  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
150  (*data)(i, j) = func((*data)(i, j));
151  }
152  }
153  };
154 
155  void Apply(std::complex<double> (*func)(std::complex<double>), SeqViewComplex& fs, SeqViewComplex& res) {
156  Cmatrix* data = fs.GetData();
157  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
158  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
159  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
160  rs->resize(s1, s2);

163  res.SetScale(fs.GetScale());
164 
165  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
166  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
167  (*rs)(i, j) = func((*data)(i, j));
168  }
169  }
170  };
171 
172  static void Sum(SeqViewDouble& res, double scale, SeqViewDouble& ts) {
173  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
174  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
175  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
176  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
177  rs->resize(s1, s2);
178  res.SetStart(ts.GetStart());
179  res.SetSampling(ts.GetSampling());
180  res.SetScale(ts.GetScale());
181 
182  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
183  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
184  (*rs)(i, j) = (*rs)(i, j) + scale * (*data)(i, j);
185  }
186  }
187  };
188 
189  };
